greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Smallest prime q such that (p^q-1)/(p-1) is a prime, where p = prime(n).
mathematica: Do[p = Prime[n]; k = 1; While[ !PrimeQ[ (p^Prime[k] - 1)/(p - 1)], k++ ]; Print[ Prime[k]], {n, 1, 56} ]
program: (PARI) { allocatemem(932245000); for (n=1, 100, p=prime(n); q=2; while (!isprime((p^q - 1)/(p - 1)), q=nextprime(q + 1)); write("b065854.txt", n, " ", q) ) } \\ _Harry J. Smith_, Nov 01 2009
xref: Cf. A084740 (least k such that (n^k-1)/(n-1) is prime).
results.author: _Vladeta Jovovic_, Nov 26 2001
